comment: Dr. Arnold's class was well-paced and organized. A required textbook is needed, but it was informative and would be useful for teaching any level of class. The weekly assignments were clear, with instructional support modules and the grading was prompt with useful feedback. There was a lengthy lesson plan assignment in the final weeks of class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I loved this class and this professor! she is so sweet and funny. The lectures in class were so interesting and she uses her own personal stories in the lectures which was cool. If you do the work she gives you, you'll pass. Her exams a little hard but they are take home exams. Overall I'd definitely take this professor again!

This woman is by far my favorite professor I have ever had. She has helped me learn so much, and she was always available if there were any questions I had. Holly Arnold is so kind and understanding, and she genuinely cares about her students. I 100% recommend taking her if you have the chance!

She is very nice and funny. The content is not the most interesting, but having her teaching it made me want to go to class. She is very knowledgeable on the content. Most classes, there is an easy little assignment to do, but there are alternatives if you miss class. We were put in a group at the beginning that we worked with the whole semester
Dr. Arnold is a great professor! She is always willing to help if needed.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Professor Arnold is a great professor. She is funny and engaging even in an online lecture. If she taught any other courses I would definitely take her again.

Dr. Arnold is absolutely amazing! She made the online class feel like a real face to face class. Her stories are so funny and her class was the least stressful class I had all semester. There are 2 proficiency exams which can be challenging but you can ask her questions & it's open notes! Take her if you can!

Professor Arnold personality is amazing. She really cares about her students and want to make sure she does not add extra stress on us. There are not a lot of heavy assignments. There are two exams and she gives you the questions before the exam opens. The questions are not multiple choice and require a lot of detail but she is an easy grader

She's so nice! She has great stories from her teaching past and shes funny. Class can be boring but she tries to make it engaging. 2 Proficiency exams but they aren't difficult and she "helps". Other graded assignments are in class. If you miss class you just complete a discussion post & that's your attendance. 1 or 2 group projects but aren't hard
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She gives written exams, but she isnt a tough grader. Shes really nice and funny. Shes pretty young. I would definitely take her again.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Oh, she is the SWEETEST person alive!!! The class is informative but wonderful!! She is hilarious and chill, and she helps you do your best! I don't have enough nice things to say about Dr. Arnold. Take her class you won't regret it!!!

I absolutely ADORE her ! she is the best her lectures are amazing and hilarious. she really makes this class fun and she knows her stuff! all her lessons and activities will benefit you as a future teacher. she is very lenient with due dates and we only have two tests (which are take-home tests) and she prepares you for them. TAKE HER CLASS!!
Super funny. Her tests are very long and sometimes she can get off topic, but she is too adorable to get upset at.
Dr. Arnold can get off topic during lectures and can work on her time management. Her exams are very time consuming, but she is an easy grader.
Professor Arnold is such a nice person! She really cares for each of her student's and is always in such a great mood. I WOULD definitely take her!!!
